actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide limitations on the payment of educational assistance allowances to certain veterans, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that a veteran receiving educational assistance allowances who has no dependents and is in Federal, State, county, or local prison shall have such allowances computed on the same basis as a veteran in school while on active duty or on less than a half-time basis.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide limitations on the payment of educational assistance allowances to certain veterans, and for other purposes.
